sf232:4: dvau dharmau loka utpadyete bahujanāhitāya bahujanaduḥkhāya anarthāyāhitāya duḥkhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṁ yaduta adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca | adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca loka utpadyete bahujanāhitāya bahujanaduḥkhāya anarthāyāhitāya duḥkhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṁ |
sf232:5: dvau dharmau loka utpadyete bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṁ yaduta dharmacaryā samacaryā ca | dharmacaryā samacaryā ca loka utpadyete bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṁ ||
sf232:6: ye kecid anekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ saṁbhavanti sarve te adharmacaryāviṣamacaryāmūlakā adharmacaryāviṣamacaryāsamudayā adharmacaryāviṣamacaryājātīyā adharmacaryāviṣamacaryāprabhavāḥ | adharmacaryāviṣamacaryāmūlakā hi ye kecid anekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ saṁbhavanti |
sf232:7: ye kecid anekavidhāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ saṁbhavanti sarve te dharmacaryāsamacaryāmūlakādharmacaryāsamacaryāsamudayādharmacaryāsamacaryājātīyādharmacaryāsamacaryāprabhavāḥ | dharmacaryāsamacaryāmūlakā hi bhikṣavo ye kecid anekavidhāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ saṁbhavanti ||
sf232:8: dvau dharmāv anarthāya saṁvartete adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca | dvau dharmāv arthāya saṁvartete dharmacaryā samacaryā ca ||
sf232:9: yathā anarthāya arthāya evam ahitāya hitāya duḥkhāya sukhāya vyasanāya saṁpade vipattaye saṁpattaye asamṛddhaye samṛddhaye apāripūraye pāripūraye pārihāṇāya apārihāṇāya ||Hs. parihāṇāya|| dṛṣṭadhārmikasyārthasyānarthāya dṛṣṭadhārmikasyārthasyārthāya sāmparāyikasyārthasyānarthāya sāmparāyikasyārthasyārthāya |||
sf232:10: dvābhyāṁ dharmābhyām anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ utpadyante yaduta adharmacaryayā viṣamacaryayā ca | adharmacaryayā viṣamacaryayā ca anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ utpadyante |
sf232:11: dvābhyāṁ dharmābhyām anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā notpadyante yaduta dharmacaryayā samacaryayā ca | dharmacaryayā samacaryayā ca anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā notpadyante |
sf232:12: dvābhyāṁ dharmābhyām anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ notpadyante yaduta adharmacaryayā viṣamacaryayā ca | adharmacaryayā viṣamacaryayā ca anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ notpadyante |
sf232:13: dvābhyāṁ dharmābhyām anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ utpadyante yaduta dharmacaryayā samacaryayā ca | dharmacaryayā samacaryayā ca anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ utpadyante |
sf232:14: dvābhyāṁ dharmābhyām anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā utpadyante utpannāś ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṁ gacchanti yaduta adharmacaryayā viṣamacaryayā ca | adharmacaryayā viṣamacaryayā ca anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā utpadyante utpannāś ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṁ gacchanti
sf232:15: dvābhyāṁ dharmābhyām anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ notpadyante utpannāś ca prahīyante yaduta dharmacaryayā samacaryayā ca | dharmacaryayā samacaryayā ca anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ notpadyante utpannāś ca prahīyante |
sf232:16: dvābhyāṁ dharmābhyām anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā notpadyante utpannāś ca prahīyante yaduta adharmacaryayā viṣamacaryayā ca | adharmacaryayā viṣamacaryayā ca anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā notpadyante utpannāś ca prahīyante |
sf232:17: dvābhyāṁ dharmābhyām anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā utpadyante utpannāś ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṁ gacchanti yaduta dharmacaryayā samacaryayā ca | dharmacaryayā samacaryayā ca anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā utpadyante utpannāś ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṁ gacchanti || ||
